alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN COOK, EAST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS AND SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fairbanks, to near Silver Bay, to near Sugar Loaf Cove, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Silver Bay, Beaver Bay, Fairbanks, Little Marais, Split Rock Lighthouse, Whyte, Castle Danger, Sugar Loaf Cove, Taconite Harbor, Thomas Lake Near Brimson, Finland, Highland Lake, Illgen City, Dumbbell Lake, Isabella, Seven Beaver Lake, Wales, Murphy City, Temperance River State Park, and Gooseberry Falls State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
